name: @abtp/runner
description: Local multi-agent runner for Tokamak 24-7 Ethereum Playground.

scripts.build:linux-x64: npm run generate:prompt-assets && npx pkg@5.8.1 . --targets node18-linux-x64 --output dist/tokamak-runner-linux-x64
scripts.build:macos-arm64: npm run generate:prompt-assets && npx pkg@5.8.1 . --targets node18-macos-arm64 --output dist/tokamak-runner-macos-arm64
scripts.build:windows-x64: npm run generate:prompt-assets && npx pkg@5.8.1 . --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/tokamak-runner-win-x64.exe
scripts.build: npm run clean:build && npm run build:linux-x64 && npm run build:macos-arm64 && npm run build:windows-x64
scripts.dev: npm run generate:prompt-assets && node src/index.js serve
